AboutPage.title: About AARAPPAR
paragraphs: Welcome to AARAPPAR, where culinary craftsmanship meets contemporary design. Our restaurant was founded with the goal of bringing the warmth of South Indian hospitality to Frankfurt.

Every dish is prepared with carefully selected ingredients, vibrant spices and an eye for presentation. Our dining room combines modern lines with rich colour accents to mirror the balance of tradition and innovation on the plate.
Whether you join us for a relaxed dinner, a festive celebration or a quick lunch break, we strive to make every visit memorable with attentive service and unforgettable flavours.
